title: ‘Lanka stands poised upon a razor’s edge’ – Karu J calls for a united opposition
content: Source of News: Ada Derana Thanks to the present administration, Sri Lanka stands poised upon a razor’s edge. This regime has silenced dissent with brutality and violence, divided the opposition and depleted our numbers through coercion and extortion, says a statement issued by United National Party (UNP) Deputy Leader Karu Jayasuriya.
